entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Newmarket
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:06 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -23.5°C

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 70%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 70 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 5.
